content.rendered:
Welcome

Progress Built On Partnerships

We begin with an adoption process that considers your family values, lifestyle and philanthropic goals.

learn More
Sign Up
  • Features
  • About Us
  • Getting Started
  • FAQ's
  • Articles

Who We Are: The Bershire Workforce

Berkshire Asset Management

We are a trusted advisor to our clients, assisting them in developing and accessing alternatives to meet their strategic objectives.

Crypto Asset Allocation

Let the experts handle the work of making you rich.

Berkshire Crypto Wallet

Gain secured exposure to crypto currency space with us at Berkshire.

About us

We set the pace, others follow

As high-conviction investors, we refuse to follow the herd. Instead, we focus on stocks that are out of favour with mainstream investors, as we believe that these offer the greatest potential for long-term gains. Providing investors access to opportunities that will strengthen their portfolios, through Intelligently designed diversified portfolios and ETF solutions. We offervalue added exposure to emerging industries, asset classes and markets as well as differentiated approaches to traditional strategies.

Learn More

Developing Various Talents To Lead Us Ahead

We believe in delivering the best for all our people, so we offer leadership development programs tailored to the needs of each party.

Workforce diversity

We focus on attracting diverse talented people by maintaining a strong employer brand and expanding where and how we meet potential prospective employees. We employ disadvantaged communities, including women, people of color, people with disabilities and people with a military background, among others.

Inclusive workplace

Our business is designed to help people manage their financial future, and the same applies to our people. We invest in our employees and their future by building a culture of support, teamwork, flexibility and balance.

Connected… Committed

What unites a global investment and research company? Communicating with our customers, our culture, each other and the communities we serve. This unity fosters cooperation and empowers us to pursue a common goal — to bring about better results

Berkshire Trading

Ensuring positive results for our customers is central to all the decisions we make.

Algorithmic Trading Solutions

Our comprehensive list of advanced in-house algorithms and layout solutions can be customized to meet individual needs.

High-Touch Trading

The Bershire high quality sales team uses our global network of institutional customers to earn natural money. A loyal partner to our customers, orders are treated with the same care and diligence as a side buyer who manages his orders.

Portfolio Trading

Our knowledgeable international portfolio trading team assists with the planning and implementation of cash flows, estimates and transitions. Our global trading platform helps to balance globalization.

Getting Started

Sign Up

We help people achieve their goals by providing the right funding, wealth management and insurance advice.

Registration
Start Investing

Pick your investment

Speak to any of our staffs and agents to get a tailored investment plan to suit your needs.

Watch your wealth grow

When it comes to investing, most people have a long-term goal – we’re here to guarantee it.

Start Earning

Time tested investment methods

Our team of independent financial advisers will work with you to build financial plans that enable you to achieve your short, medium and long term financial goals. 

  • Low Service Charges
  • Quick and Safe Transactions
  • An Award Winning Company
